sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addFilter, addGender, removeFilter, removeGender, } from "../Redux/productRedux"; import "./CSS/Sidepanel.css"; const Sidepanel = () => { const mystyle = { //styling fontWeight: 600, }; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { const checkbox = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-checkbox"); for (let check of checkbox) { check.addEventListener("click", function (e) { const brand = e.target.value; if (e.target.checked === true) { dispatch(addFilter({ brand })); } else { dispatch(removeFilter({ brand })); } }); } const radio = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-radiobtn"); for (let btn of radio) { btn.addEventListener("click", function (e) { const gender = e.target.value; if (e.target.checked) { dispatch(addGender({ gender })); } else { dispatch(removeGender({ gender })); } }); } }); return (
FILTERS
{/*styling*/}
BRAND
); }; export default Sidepanel;
